msbt.message: I'm trying to burn all the scenery from this island into my memory while I'm still here. Starting tomorrow, I'll probably be too busy packing up my stuff.

I'll always love the scenery and vibe of this island.<10_4 /> I guess I'm just now realizing how much I'll miss it here. I'm busy trying to touch base with everyone on the island today before I finish packing for my big move.
Thanks for everything you've done for me, .I'm sure I'm gonna be super busy tomorrow ahead of my big move, so I figured I'd sneak that in now.
